html: I walked into work behind @RepRussFulcher this morn. Some members act like big shots. Not Russ. He was unassuming & kind, incl thanking officer for service. Russ didn’t know I was behind him. He was being nice because that’s who he is. You’ve got a good one, Idaho. Be proud.
text:
I walked into work behind @RepRussFulcher this morn. Some members act like big shots. Not Russ. He was unassuming & kind, incl thanking officer for service. 

Russ didn’t know I was behind him. He was being nice because that’s who he is. 

You’ve got a good one, Idaho. Be proud.

html: (1/2) Grateful for the South Dakotans furloughed or working without pay. For them, today’s announcement is welcome relief. We shouldn't celebrate yet, though. Congress still has a job to do. We need to reach a deal to secure the border and fund the government for the year.
text:
(1/2) Grateful for the South Dakotans furloughed or working without pay. For them, today’s announcement is welcome relief. 

We shouldn't celebrate yet, though. Congress still has a job to do. We need to reach a deal to secure the border and fund the government for the year.
